CustomField.inlineHelpText: Our graduates reflect on themselves and project themselves in the future
CustomField.label: LG 4

value.fullName: LO7 : Graduates know the principles and mechanisms of the corporate social responsibility in its process of decision-making and are able to work ethically and responsibly
value.label: LO7 : Graduates know the principles and mechanisms of the corporate social responsibility in its process of decision-making and are able to work ethically and responsibly

value.fullName: LO8 : Graduate are able to learn from experience, start over and reassess themselves to develop an ability to anticipate and look into the future
value.label: LO8 : Graduate are able to learn from experience, start over and reassess themselves to develop an ability to anticipate and look into the future
